subject: Hello beneficiary,
body:
Hello beneficiary,
Good-news.
With the best concerns I wish to inform you that you're in list among
those whose pending payment has been approved by the IMF in
conjunction with the World Bank, because the fund has been delayed as
a result of your wrong follow up with unauthorized individuals to
receive these USD$72,000.000.00. These fund originated from unpaid
contract sum, inheritance compensation that originated from Europe,
Asia Plus Middle East, America and Africa. You are among the listed of
individuals and companies whose unpaid fund have been approved for
payment under the supervision of the International Monetary Fund
Headquarter.
Note, you're required to contact this office within 48 hours of
receiving this notification, don't forget to reconfirm your following
details: full name, mobile number and the rest of your other necessary
details accordingly to enable us to normalize the documents in your
name and advise you on the next easier step you should receive the
said fund here under your claim. In summery, beware of this important
notice that you should be liable to settle your fund documentary
renewal cost because it have been long delayed, otherwise don't bother
to be responding if you're not the intended person to this message,
because these fund isn't permit to be release to you without the
documentary renewal and all your payment files to get activated!
Yours faithfully,
Mr. Robert J Carter
Always reply to:( 
fgodrick45@gmail.com
 )
International Settlement Payment Coordinator Unit.

subject: Re:   Hello beneficiary,
body:
Dear Mr. Robert Carter,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am indeed interested in receiving the funds that have been approved by the IMF and World Bank.

However, before we proceed, I would like to clarify a few things:

1. Could you please provide more details about the origin of these funds? You mentioned they are from an unpaid contract sum but I would appreciate if you could specify which contract this refers to.

2. What exactly does the fund renewal cost cover and how much is it?

3. What are the next steps in order for me to receive these funds?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Phyllis

subject: Re: Hello beneficiary,
body:
Greetings Phyllis,

In regards to the USD$72,800.000.00 here in your name then it's my pleasure
to ask you to know how and where method of payment you will like to be
receiving the funds, follow by you're expected to pay $175.00 for your
payment files renewal fee as i explained to my first message, and after the
fee is paid and your payment files here is renewed then we can proceed
immediately for the release of the funds to you upon your request and
direction of payment method to receive the funds please kindly advice.

Note, i am here ready to proceed with your transaction immediately upon
your compliment accordingly thanks.

Yours faithfully,

Mr. Robert J Carter
International Settlement Payment Coordinator Unit.
